ein_in01,108,27,5	script	Gear Dealer#EinbWeps	731,{
if(faction != $einbfaction) {
	mes "[^0000ffGear Dealer^000000]";
	mes "I outa shoot you dead right here!";
	close;
	}
callshop "EinbWeps01",0;
}
